name: Unexpected Survivor
description:
Hello all!

This is my graded unit project. I have made this game for my College assessment.  Its a survival zombie game. I have made this game using Unity 3D.  I have also used a number of Syntystore packages which I have bought to create the world as well as a few other assets that I have made myself. 

Music is all outsourced from different websites for sound effects from freessound org while the background theme music from xyz game sounds. 

I have enjoyed making this game a lot. It was a very difficult challenge as I have never made a 3D game before.

Story:

This game story is about a character called Dirk who enjoys a peaceful retirement which gets disturbed by a zombie apocalypse. From there he has to find strength to be the hero that the world needs.

Instructions and controls file is included in the file.

Simply unzip into desired folder and run the executable.

Thank you for playing.
